replies.body: Yeah, my bad there, I'd blanked on the fact we'd put this on Garen when I made that comment. We still don't intend to use this widely, but I should definitely have mentioned we had another case in development.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AKp7LP28,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-05T00:30:20.520+0000)
>
> Yeah, my bad there, I'd blanked on the fact we'd put this on Garen when I made that comment. We still don't intend to use this widely, but I should definitely have mentioned we had another case in development.

I just want to take a moment to point out that you tied a mechanic meant for tank busting to a passive which targets people who get kills, who are usually squishy damage-dealers... and apparently wrecked Garen's early power and both offensive and defensive scalings to do so...

I really don't see how this is going to help him do anything at all. I really do like the anti-snowball shutdown-focus idea, especially as a tie-in to actually make his ultimate worth something later on, but I don't understand at all why you wrecked the silence on his Q (which is what gives him strong matchups in lane) as well as removing base damage and crit scaling from Judgement, which was a pretty unique thing for a bruiser to have. RIP IE synergy.

Oh and the abysmally low hard-cap on defensive scaling for W? The tenacity removal from the active, which was meant to let garen soldier his way into the fights? That change alone makes it look like he will be weaker than Season 2 Garen as a pick.
This is a really good point.

>I really do like the anti-snowball shutdown-focus idea

Seems to me that this would better fit an item. 

An item named "Last resort" with bad stats but specifically made for shuting down the most dangerous enemy player.

Off topic, that new hydra item, does that fulfill the item you described the other day? 

Specifically, you mentioned that fighters need an item that worked like Atma's did (allowing tank stats to scale into things that didn't benefit tanks) but in a more healthy way. It seems like that was the item you were describing.

Yeah, that was the example I had in mind. Possible we might revisit that space at some point too, offer another approach based off the same principle as well (though likely as an alternative rather than something that stacks with Titanic Hydra).

Gotcha. 


Does Sterak's Gage's base 25% damage increase trinity force procs? I thought it would but I'm not sure based on how its coded
it does indeed, sterak's+trinity on scarner = ~350 damage procs(tested on pbe)

NOt much related. But please, PLEASE stop reworking garen! THis is not a good rework, you are nerfing him all over the place! Fcking dont even think about doing this. ANd dont even dare to touch shen when you cant even handle the balancing of fcking garen! Just dont!

Did you actually read the notes on Garen? Cause it's not a huge nerf, it's a bunch of little nerfs and removal of the randomly snowballing AD Garen that wasn't at all fun to deal with. Yes, they nerfed him, but they added a lot to what he does in game beyond being a spinning damage sponge with a reasonably weak execute late game. The description was an early nerf with a buff to usefulness late...the notes read pretty darn close to that imo.

Wait, they added something? The only thing they added was an ultimate buff against the enemy killers. Thats it. ALl of his other abilities were nerfed. You want to tell me that garen was toxic to play against?

HA!

Well, they changed most of the abilities rather than 100% nerfing them. Albeit most of them are overall nerfs early for the most part but if you look at it in depth they really just did what they said and made his early game a little less oppressive while making him a bit more relevant late game with the villain passive. It's not going to be useful all the time, but I think it'll be more useful than he was pre-patch.  How about instead of just complaining on the forums you could actually give it a chance and play the new Garen. Then if you still don't like it, come back and say what you don't like rather than making general, useless complaints.

All of those changes were direct nerfs. Also, no, they didnt make him relevant lategame. With the current nerfed kit he wont even get close to the enemy to use his kit. They nerfeed him early, and for the rest of the game.

I dont want to give a chance for such obviously shitty rework which directly nerfs an already mediocre champion.

Once again, I'll ask, have you played the new Garen yet? If not, you opinion here is unfortunately not really useful as there's another thread where someone has actually been testing it out whom is very satisfied with the new kit just asking for a handful of clarifications on things. Please feel free to voice your opinion again once you've tried him in a handful of games in even match-ups.

I have indeed tested him out, and that is why i am talking like this. He is fcking useless. His early game is nerfed so now he counters noone. Yiu cant even get near the enemy team because of the tenacity and q nerfs. when you use e you are better off just going full aa on the enemy than using your own skill!

This new garen is nerfed to the ground. He received only 1 buff, and even that one is situational and useoless because with the current nerfedgaren kit you cant even apply the strenght from the buff.

The only time i felt stronger than before was when i managed to catch the enemy adc in the jungle and ambush him. And thats it.

Yea, you've gone full blind qq complaint mode. Sounds like you're just doing it wrong. Not gonna continue to encourage you by responding after this as nothing you're saying is in any way productive. Byebye

It is funny that you are running away after i indeed said that i have tested him. Didnt count on that before writing, did you?

Also i am not doing it wrong since i have mained this guy in previous seasons and played with him.

It is not qq. It is objective. Look at the numbers and how they were changed. Even objectively looking only at numbers you can see that this was a nerf.

Even before this "rework" garen had a trouble getting to the enemy as he was easily kiteable. The current "reworked" kit multiplies that problem by taking away some of the sentials tools for garen to get to the enemy team.

P.S. If what i say is not productive (even thought like you asked i have tested him out and i have played him before for a long time) Then how would you value your own contribution to this "discussion"?

TL;DR
To the P.S. I never said mine was, just that yours wasn't. Was kind of the whole reason I was responding since you were essentially just flaming Riot to begin with. Good reading comprehension skills there buddy :)

Nice straw man. I didnt talk about what you said, i asked you a simple question.

I think its your reading comprehension skills that are in need of help because you cannot even comprehend a simple question directed to you.

I will also take a page from your book.

Have you played with the new garen, at least 20 games (Like i have)?

Have you played with garen, at least 150 games (Like i have)?

If you have not, then what right over me do you have to talk as if i was in blind rage. Because from what i am seeing you are simply blindly defending riot while purposefully ignoring the objective numerical nerfs to garen.

Really don't think it should be common though.
Good thing it's not, then.

Why % MAX hp true damage. 

If garen is supposed to hunt down and execute villains why not % missing hp true damage to double down with that theme? 

Why not % current hp true damage to help him get into ult execute range while making it harder for him to get the kill without his ult? 

Why not flat true damage to help him kill squishy targets faster? They didn't build defenses after all... 

I think in garen's case that any of these could be better tools for the job. 

Props for admitting your forgetfulness though. Appreciate the honesty.

in terms of diablo drop rates %hp true damage is ranked as a rare legendary.
